com.cognex.dataman.sdk.discovery

Class EthernetDiscoverer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.cognex.dataman.sdk.discovery.EthernetDiscoverer

  • public class EthernetDiscoverer
extends Object
    Discovers available DataMan devices on the specified network interface.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener
      Interface definition for a callback to be invoked if a device is found.

    • Constructor Summary

      Creates an EthernetDiscoverer object on the specified NetworkInterface

      Starts the device discovery process.

      Cancels the currently running device discovery.
      static EthernetDiscoverer wifiInterfaceDiscoverer(Context context, EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener)
      Discovers available DataMan devices on the WiFi network, if available, and executes the listener on the main looper Handler.

      Discovers available DataMan devices on the WiFi network, if available.

    • Constructor Detail

      • EthernetDiscoverer

        public EthernetDiscoverer(NetworkInterface ni,
                          Handler handler,
                          EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException
        Creates an EthernetDiscoverer object on the specified NetworkInterface
        Parameters:
        ni - The NetworkInterface object to use for discovering the devices
        handler - The Handler object to be used to execute the listeners on its thread. (specify null for main looper Handler)
        listener - The EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener to invoke if a device is found.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if no InterfaceAddress is available on the specified NetworkInterface

    • Method Detail

      • wifiInterfaceDiscoverer

        public static EthernetDiscoverer wifiInterfaceDiscoverer(Context context,
                                                         Handler handler,
                                                         EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener)
        Discovers available DataMan devices on the WiFi network, if available. Please specify android.permission.ACCESS_WIFI_STATE permission in manifest to use this method.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context object to use.
        handler - The Handler object to be used to execute the listeners on its thread. (specify null for main looper Handler)
        listener - The EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener to invoke if a device is found.
        Returns:
        an EthernetDiscoverer instance configured for the device Wifi connection, or null if the Wifi is not available.

      • wifiInterfaceDiscoverer

        public static EthernetDiscoverer wifiInterfaceDiscoverer(Context context,
                                                         EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener)
        Discovers available DataMan devices on the WiFi network, if available, and executes the listener on the main looper Handler.
        Parameters:
        context - The Context object to use.
        listener - The EthernetDiscoverer.OnDataManDeviceDetectedListener listener to invoke if a device is found.
        Returns:
        an EthernetDiscoverer instance configured for the device Wifi connection, or null if the Wifi is not available.

      • getDeviceFilter

        public int getDeviceFilter()

      • setDeviceFilter

        public void setDeviceFilter(int deviceFilter)

      • startDeviceDiscovery

        public void startDeviceDiscovery()
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Starts the device discovery process.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the interface can not be opened.

      • startDeviceDiscovery

        public void startDeviceDiscovery(boolean treatBootupAsHello)
                          throws IllegalArgumentException
        Starts the device discovery process.
        Parameters:
        treatBootupAsHello - If true, the listener will treat Bootup packets as Hello packets when processing incoming cognamer packets.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the interface can not be opened.

      • sendIdentifier

        public void sendIdentifier()
        Send identifier packet on the network. Useful to reuse existing instance.

      • stopDeviceDiscovery

        public void stopDeviceDiscovery()
        Cancels the currently running device discovery.

      • setLogger

        public void setLogger(Logger logger)
        Sets the optional logger which can be used for debugging purposes.
        Parameters:
        logger - The logger object to be used for logging.
